data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
In the minute 2, Nuno Almeida awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Benfica capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gil Vicente's half?
Can Benfica capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 4, In Barcelos, Jardel (Benfica) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Free kick Gil Vicente.
Lourency (Gil Vicente) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 5, Gil Vicente's Claude Goncalves breaks free at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Benfica have a goal kick.
Nuno Almeida signals a Benfica throw-in in Gil Vicente's half.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Benfica.
Ball goes out of play for a Benfica goal kick.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
In the minute 8, Benfica have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Gil Vicente.
In the minute 10, Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelos.
In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 12, Ball safe as Gil Vicente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Benfica.
Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Gil Vicente.
In Barcelos Benfica drive forward through Darwin Nunez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 18, Nuno Almeida signals a Benfica throw-in in Gil Vicente's half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Haris Seferovic's header is off-target for Benfica.
Goal kick for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Nuno Almeida awards Gil Vicente a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Benfica's Everton gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos. But the effort is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
In the minute 27, Nuno Almeida signals a throw-in for Benfica, close to Gil Vicente's area.
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
In the minute 29, Nuno Almeida awards the away team a throw-in.
Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 32, Gil Vicente's Antoine Leautey gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Nuno Almeida awards Benfica a goal kick.
Throw-in Gil Vicente.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
In the minute 34, Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Benfica.
Benfica are coming forward and Jan Vertonghen gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
Benfica drives forward and Gilberto gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
In the minute 39, In Barcelos Benfica attack through Pizzi. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelos.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Benfica.
In the minute 39, Nogueira is booked for the home team.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
Benfica push forward at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos and Jan Vertonghen gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Gil Vicente defence.
In the minute 42, It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelos.
Gil Vicente surge into the attack at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos but Vitor Carvalhoâ€™s header is off-target.
Benfica have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Gil Vicente.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Gilberto (Benfica) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, Free kick Benfica.
At Estadio Cidade de Barcelos the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Antoine Leautey for Gil Vicente gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Benfica at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Nogueira (Gil Vicente) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Benfica make their first substitution with Adel Taarabt replacing Pedrinho.
The home team replace Antoine Leautey with Tim Hall.
In the minute 47, Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Julian Weigl (Benfica) has received a first yellow card.
Nuno Almeida waits before resuming play because Lucas Mineiro for Gil Vicente is still down.
In the minute 48, Lucas Mineiro is back on his feet again.
Throw-in Benfica.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Gil Vicente pushes forward through Samuel Dias Lino, whose finish on goal is saved.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Lucas Mineiro (Gil Vicente) strikes at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos but his header is cleared.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Gil Vicente are pushing forward but Lucas Mineiro's finish is wide of the goal.
Gil Vicente's Lourency gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 56, Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Gil Vicente's Lucas Mineiro goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
In the minute 57, Nuno Almeida awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Own goal! Rodrigao Prado scores in his own net to make it 0-1.
In the minute 63, Gil Vicente's Lourency is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 64, Gil Vicente's Vitor Carvalho has been booked in Barcelos.
Goal! Benfica increase their lead to 0-2 through a well-placed header from Everton.
Haris Seferovic with an assist there.
In the minute 67, Gil Vicente's Lourency misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Benfica goal kick.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
Diogo Goncalves is on a sub for Gilberto for Benfica.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Benfica advance rapidly upfield but Nuno Almeida blows for offside.
In the minute 70, Henrique Gomes is replacing Vitor Carvalho for the home team.
Boubacar Hanne is replacing Samuel Dias Lino for the home team.
Nuno Almeida signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Benfica's half.
In the minute 71, Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
Ball safe as Gil Vicente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gil Vicente's Lourency has run offside.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Gil Vicente.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
Nuno Almeida awards Gil Vicente a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Gil Vicente!
In the minute 79, Benfica have a goal kick.
Benfica are whistled for offside.
Jorge Jesus (Benfica) is making a third substitution, with Luca Waldschmidt replacing Darwin Nunez.
In the minute 82, Andreas Samaris is replacing Julian Weigl for Benfica at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 85, The away team have replaced Pizzi with Franco Cervi. This is the fifth substitution made today by Jorge Jesus.
Benfica are caught offside.
Ricardo Soares is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos with Yves Baraye replacing Lourency.
In the minute 88, The home team replace Lucas Mineiro with Ahmed Isaiah.
Benfica will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Gil Vicente.
Tim Hall (Gil Vicente) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Benfica at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Nuno Almeida signals a Benfica throw-in in Gil Vicente's half.
Full-time! The final score is 0-2.
